title: Debug Quiz - Width Comparison
description: Testing width consistency between code and LaTeX questions

questions.question:
What is the result of this Python code?

```python
def calculate(x, y):
    return x * y + 2

result = calculate(5, 3)
print(result)
```
Solve this mathematical equation: $$\int_{0}^{1} x^2 dx = ?$$
What is the value of this expression? $$\lim_{x \to 0} \frac{\sin(x)}{x} = ?$$
